alert.note: Alert for Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 03 at 1:46PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM FRIDAY TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of West winds 25 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...The Upper North Platte River, including Saratoga and Encampment. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden strong damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be especially at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
